reviews.review: Portal 2 is a game that I would most definitely recommend for people that enjoy strategic puzzle games. I wouldn't say that this game is childish, because the gameplay can be difficult at times, but the storyline is complex and it never ceases to amaze me. I'm hooked on this game.
Очень хорошая и логическая игра, всем советую не пожелеете!

best puzzle mind problem solving game, also fps + rpg. and a very good storyline that is in the same universe as half life :) 
totally recomend this game because the storyline is just great and require problem solving skills that anyone can solve but in a long amount of time.
Casse-tête jouissif, concept unique, bourré d'humour, un jeu qui m'a marqué dans ma vie de gamer !
왘ㅋㅋㅋ 진짜 명작이다 돈이 아깝지 않음!

Fun for everyone!
9/10
Very good game I recommend it (Is kind of hard but you can search for help in google or youtube)
its a good puzzle game for intermediates its reeeeeaaaaaallly hard for beginners  but im kinda a beginner or used to be i found it quite hard but it was a good stepping stone for other puzzle games.

Portal 2 is a really nice, medium lengthed puzzle game. 
Make the game even more interesting by reading the fan theories though, that'll make the happy game seem like a dark nightmare.
Oyun çok eğlenceli ve zeka oyunu biraz aksiyon içeren oyundur.Herkese tavsiye ederim alın oynayın Co-op ve kendiniz bölümde oluşturabilirsiniz.

Uno de los mejores juego de estrategia jamas antes hechos, lo que hay que resaltar de este juego aparte de sus buenos graficos es que es emocionante el pensar como resolver las pruebas en cuanto mas avancemos y nos divierte por la comedia que nos traen estos personajes.

NO LO PIENSES UNA VEZ, SOLO COMPRALO!

P.D. Incluye editor de mapas!! *w*

[h1] Portal 2 [/h1]
 

         [u] Что же это такое? [/u]

Это:
 
 [*] Мир, наполненный головоломками

 [*] Веселый кооператив, в котором вы и ваши друзья можете вместе поломать головы над решением различных задач

 [*] Простой, но так же интересный сюжет

 [*] Приемлимая графика

 [*] Низкие системные требования

 [*] Вечная слава.

Графика: 8/10
Сюжет: 9/10
Геймплей: 10/10
Кооператив: 10/10

Средняя оценка: 9,25/10.
С радостью рекомендую всем игрокам, геймерам и просто людям, связавшим свою жизнь с играми это творение - Portal 2
10/10 Mu bonitu

Continuação fantástica de Portal, trouxe a mesma jogabilidade, com enredo super bem elaborado, dificuldade e tempo de jogo elevados, um coop divertidíssimo, participação da comunidade em criação de níveis. Recomendo a todos que gostam do gênero.

Holy. Fucking. Shit. This is by far the best Valve game I have played. At least 500% better than Portal 1, it has amazing co op, GLaDOS is back and more sarcastic than ever... Also, community test chambers... HOW CAN YOU GO WRONG? BUY THIS GAME.

Это шедевр. Шикарная анимация, шикарная графика. Сюжет увекателен. Его интересно изучать. По ходу игры могут появиться интересные и неожиданные моменты. Замечательно.

10 Уитлов из 10
IFAS 10/11
toooooo gooood

"SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACE!!!"

Do I really need to say more?

10/10.

Much much better than the first game to be honest. I was kind of worried it was going to be more of the same thing as the first game which still would have been fun if you were really really into portal but I liked the new tools (like the repulsion gel and everything) that made solving the puzzles a lot harder. Also the story was a lot better and more fun. And the last level, the fight against Weatley, was so cool. Save for the part that i felt like we were left on a cliff hanger at the very end, the ending was great. I wish there were more bonus levels like the first game had but the story mode game itself is enough fun as it is.
De 50.000 personas el 99% son votos positivos. Te lo vas a perder???
muy bueno
Идеальная игра всем советую поиграть. Сюжет захватывающий, загадочный и интересный. Сложно ,но проходимо. Я не говорил ещё о физеке это - О боооже шедевр.

Un gioco unico, un ottimo lavoro, una storia bella e una grafica essendo fatta con la "source engine" molto bella.

L'inizio del gioco può sembrare noioso e uguale al primo per certi casi. Ma poco piu avanti bisogna iniziare a ragionare bene perchè hanno aggiunto cose che nel primo non c'erano.

Come si può giocare da soli si può giocare sia nelle coperative con gli amici, o mappe di gioco o mappe del workshop di steam (il quale consiglio più il workshop) con mappe di svolgimento con una coperazione con il proprio compagno e prendere i giusti tempi.
Давно в такие игры не играл. Хотя и сюжета немного не хватало, но всё же интересная игра.)
Fun game.

This game has numerous puzzles that could really stump you and has hilarious voice lines!
And most importantly...... This game has fricken portals!!!

1. Обожаю игры с редакторами уровней.
2. Старый добрый портал. Прошел на пиратке, искупился покупкой.
4. Пункта, следущего за вторым, нету.
5. Хочу в кооператив.
有时稍卡。另外地图编辑器的功能不完整。没有气导运输管，光球系统以及钉子墙。但她依然很好玩。我很喜欢慧特利和GLaDOS。

The writing is brilliant, plot twists and funny characters are well made or crafted. The music is top notch, the environments and rich background/history of Aperture really brings life to the game. Gameplay wise it forces you to think, it tests your patience literally the length of the game is 9 hours single player.

Most of all the Story of GlaDOS is what made me review this game.

This is Portal 2, the sequel of Portal and honestly, the best game of the saga.

[u] [b] Reasons that why you should buy this game: [/b] [/u]

✓ Perfect puzzles
✓ Best enemies in the whole videogame history
✓ Great story
✓ Laugh and cry, this game makes you feel like if you were Chell
✓ You finished the game? Dont worry, you've an insane Workshop Chambers made by the community
✓ Anyone can run Portal 2 in any kind of PC because of  it uses Source Engine
✓ Cooperative mode
✓ Easy, medium, hard? Nope, this game challenges you to think and to use your logic

Insane game, one of the jewells of the videogames.

so gud

A worthy successor to the original Portal. If I were to complain, it would be to regret that the puzzles were not more challenging. This however is a pretty throw-away complaint in a game designed to be fun, and funny. The voice acting, spectacle, and humor have all gotten huge injections in the sequel, and honestly - it could have been a free-running game with no puzzles and this story and I would have paid full price.

MANOW, o jogo faz uma sequência linda e impressionante e muito interativa com o primeiro jogo, e tem geleias azuis e laranjas bem loucas.
Se você gosta de geleias e de portais, recomendo.

Esse jogo vai render-te altos replays junto ao primeiro jogo.

Portal 2 is one of the most epic games I have played in my whole life. The futuristic and misterious atmosphere that surrounds the game makes it totally different from other games. Apparently all human beings have died and you are the last one. The whole game you feel the lonely of being basically "the last human", interacting only with GLaDos and others A.I. The game requires patience and lots of logical thoughts from the player to solve each challenge. I totally recommend the game for those who appreciate a good puzzle or "dungeon" game.

Não é atoa que portal tem 99% de aprovação. Eu nunca tinha jogado portal antes, vi alguns vídeos sobre, nossa uma arminha que atira azul e laranja, deve ser legalzinho. Ai sem nada pra fazer baixei a demonstraçao de portal 1, quando comecei a rir de mais das piadinhas da glados, do humor negro dela e comecei com uma vontade absurda de jogar o game completo. Comprei o bundle portal 1 e 2 e nao me arrependo, um dos melhores jogos que joguei até hoje, a história é fantastica 

glados nota 10
Wheatley nota 10

personagens estremamente marcantes e que são bem dificeis de ver em qualquer jogo. Entao recomendo a comrpra principalmente do portal 2... o primeiro jogo é bem curto funciona mais como uma introduçao, pois nao da nem pra falar que é um jogo completo, mais portal 2 sem olhar tutoriais e nem guias na internet da pra chegar a 8 horas na campanha principal facil. está bem dificil ( o que eu acho bom ) mas nao impossivel, apos algumas tentativas você consegue perceber o que fazer no game.

Até nao pode ter um portal 3, mas a conclusão dos jogos me agradou muito entao vale a pena jogar sim portal 1 e 2 pra quem nunca jogou e quer um jogo com historia e personagens marcantes.
Portal 2 is Portal 2, is there any other reason to call it a great game?

I LOLed so, so many times playing this game.  For me, this game resolved 100% of the issues I had with the original Portal game.  The story was fleshed out, the world was vivid and well-realized, and the voice acting was spot-on and hilarious.  Such a great game--will remember it a long time, and may replay someday.
Игра хороша, но один минус все же есть. СЮЖЕТ. Ну оОчень быстро проходится, даже кооп за пару часов. Спасает только мастерская

Gracias Valve por esta segunda entrega.

This Portal game is way better than the first one. It has great gameplay aspects and mechanics, fun gamemodes, and even the ability to make your own levels. On a scale of one to ten, I give Portal 2 an 11.
i like turtles

Wow, wow, e ancora wow.
Portal 2 è un puzzle game in prima persona veramente incredibile.
La prima cosa che ti chiedi è: può un puzzle game avere una trama da Oscar?
Sì, e Valve ci è riuscita alla grande. Impersonerai di nuovo Chell per risolvere altre camere di test
con il ritorno di GLaDOS in pieno stile. E ci sono tanti colpi di scena che non sto a spiegare qui.
[spoiler] Perchè lo dovete giocare ad ogni costo se non lo avete fatto!!!! [/spoiler]
La grafica è stupenda con il Source Engine aggiornato al 2011, la colonna sonora è bellissima,
gameplay di facile comprensione ed è un po' cortino ma in linea di una durata di un FPS
(9 ore per la trama principale e 6 per la co-op), chè può essere ampliata grazie al Workshop con
la Perpetual Testing Initiative, un editor semplice quanto buono, per poter provare camere di test
create dagli utenti (sia singole che in co-op) anche se avrei voluto più oggetti di selezione e che non ci fosse uno dei problemi più infamanti se vuoi creare mappe gigantesche dove l'errore "ci sono troppi oggetti" è sempre dietro l'angolo. E in questo gioco, nella storia e in co-op, è presente tanto humor.
Se non lo avete giocato, vi ordino immediatamente di farlo!!!
Brilliant.
10 из 10 порталов
Игра супер! интересная,задумчивая место не для лентяев))
Best game ever, jogo da minha vida.
Juego muy buena dinamica y historia muy bonita recomindo jugar al 1.El juego esta lleno de easter eggs graciosos.El cooperativo es muy bueno lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos

it's ok

如果你和我一样，热爱解谜，喜欢思考，而且是强迫症患者(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻，这个游戏不买能忍？
十分丰富的解谜数量，耐玩性自然是不用多说，而且拥有创意工坊，玩完了主线可以在游戏里载入网络上的地图
对于传送门什么的，这种题材非常新颖，有些难题也会困扰你一段时间，正因为如此，我才更喜欢这个游戏
通关一个关卡也许有不止一种的方法，通过尝试找到最快的方法来和好友比赛吧
传送门是一个可以联机的游戏，联机上面有完全不同的关卡，需要充分的配合即可达到目标
对于这种解密类的游戏，入手是绝对不会后悔的，不会因为时间的推移而显得无聊
相比较一代，二代BUG变少了，而且画质有很大提升，比如一代的传送门炒鸡难看

既然这个游戏听起来还不错，那我们来谈一谈购买方面吧
不降价的时候不建议购买。。因为真的不便宜。。

个人比较推荐在降价时购买V社大包，像我一样都是单个买的感觉好傻。。同样的钱只买了几个游戏。。。

Portal 2 is an incredible sequel to a great game. The amazing puzzles, the wonderful artwork, the atmospheric world, the charming characters, the fascinating story and the incredible soundtrack is all that makes this franchise one of the best series ever, as Portal 2 is an example of all of that. I could go for hours on why this game is great but I don't think it still would be enough.

portal 2 is an ingenious puzzler that draws you in from its first moments. After i  beat the game i ended up thinking about it for days to come that doesn't mean that after you beat the campaign there isn't anything to do there are thousands of awesome maps you can download and countless hours of coop fun you can have buy this now!
One of the best game ever made. Intuitive, fun and mind-blowing, don't miss it!

One of the best games I have ever played.

With double the play time as the first Portal, Portal 2 is a well developed game picking it where the first ended. There is actually a decent story through the single player mode. With much of the same game concepts they still add some different puzzles and traps along the way. 
The difficulty was increased for the testing. Plenty of times I had to just sit and think of how the hell I the test was possible. I will admit I had to look up some sort of walk through for 2 tests. I was getting so annoyed my computer desk was at risk of being ripped in half.
Waiting for a friend to purchase the game so we can try out the Co-Op story together. Overall the game is great and they did a magical job on the sequel to Portal.

Great sequel to a great game.  Picks up a questionable number of years after the first game, continuing the same story.

Pros:
- Great humor and dialogue keep the player entertained it what would otherwise be just a tough puzzle game
- Many new mechanics to play around with (fluids, lasers, etc.)
- Several easter eggs for people wanting to investigate the world further
- Voice acting is top-notch, for Chell especially
- Tough puzzles keep you engaged for the entirety of the game
- Original, interesting plot
- Community workshop puzzles to play after you complete the main story

Cons:
- Robots try to kill you :(
- That's all I could think of

What are you still reading for?  Go play this game!
Das Spiel ist nach wie vor sehr zu empfehlen, tolle story, für damals sehr gute Grafik.
